theory_assignments.reasoning: Expands hallmarks to include immune dysfunction, stem cell exhaustion, altered intercellular communication, and impaired water homeostasis, reflecting systemic aging.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Includes chronic low-grade inflammation alongside genomic instability, telomere attrition, and loss of proteostasis, emphasizing systemic aging effects.
